Text:
You can download here all shows!!
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6316759/Coast_To_Coast_Am_2006-2010_All_Shows

Well, not quite.
The C2C Live shows with Ian Punnett are missing in the Demonoid torrents.
I downloaded every MP3 I could find on the C2C website and left the original filenames.
The files are not tampered by any player software.
(Windows Media Player likes to write into the files!)
Also I used the show descriptions from C2C's website for my own HTML's.

Ok! my apologies!
Tanx for good work and keep with
awakening the people.
Peace & Love!!!!!
